abstract: Web advertising experts see a myriad of difficulties in making brand advertising work on social networking sites.
snippet: Web advertising experts see a myriad of difficulties in making brand advertising work on social networking sites.
lead_paragraph: FOR some time, Procter & Gamble, the world’s largest advertiser, has been dipping its big toes into the vast pool of Facebook, now the world’s largest social network. I recently knocked on the doors of both companies to hear how the experiment was going. Neither was inclined to say much.

headline.main: Advertisers Face Hurdles on Social Networking Sites
headline.print_headline: Do You Want to ‘Friend’ a Detergent?
